div.p:
The xxiij day of the moneth of Januar' the yer of god et cetera lxxmo it is a
and fullely accordit betuix gilbert chawmer thomas simson' and patrik besat anent
the aucht hamburgh barellis of salmunde for the quhilkis thai stande bundin coniunctly and seueraly
til Johne' the hayis merchande of lyile and be cause that we stande bundin til him be
obligacione that he may Rayse the hale aucht hamburgh barellis of salmunde of ony ane of ws
or of our' gudis we ar' accordit and oblist be the fathis of our' bodijs ilkan til vthir
til lay and lade in the erast schip ladin with merchandice passande in flandris holande
or zelande samekile merchandice as sall content and pay his part of the saide acht hamburgh
barellis of salmunde to the saide Johne' the hayis that is to say the saide gilbert for thre
hamburgh barellis the saide thomas for thre hamburgh barellis and the forsaide patrik for twa
hamburgh barellis sua that our' obligacione may be frede And quhilk of ws that failyeis
in the ladin of thair' gudis in the saide schip to the freing of our' obligacione and ony of ws
be pundit and gert pay for him he sall be full dettour' and make hale payment til thaim
that sustenis the scathe of the hale acht hamburgh barellis of salmunde lelely and trewely
but fraude or gile

head.foreign: copia cedule computj misse a gerardo owirdale Johanni de marr'

div.p:
I gerarde owirdile graunt me to be awande til Johne' of mar' burges
of aberdene' for twa sekis of woll' bocht fra androw of murray and Robert prat
the some' of nyntene punde a schilling and twa gret quhilk some' of xix lib'
a s' j g' I oblis' me to pay the saide Johne' of mar' or to the berar' of this bill'
at andwarp merkate next cumande In witnes of the quhilk I gerarde has writtyn
this with' my awin hande the yer' of god xiiijC lxxj xv dayis in Januario
de qua cedula dictus Johannes de mar' pecijt instrumentum et sub sigillo communi sigillari

This is the deliuerans of Johne' of scrogis Johne' mathouson' gilbert leche Edmunde bannerman
and of William of the quyltis chosin in assise be cristy litstar' on that a pt part and Johne' of
torryleith the spous' of Isabell galt for him and hir' on that vthir part with the consentis of
bathe the saide parteis to decide and finaly til ende all actionis and clamys betuix thaim mo
vit for the saide cristy brethir of thar' gudis and anent the tak of the gardin the quhilkis personis
the gret athe sworne' wele and riply avysit the allegacionis of the bathe the parteis for
saide vndirstandin deliuerys decret and ordanis the saide Johne' of torrileith' and the saide Isabel galt
his spous' to deliuer furth' and in continent to the saide cristy of his brethir that ar' deide and liffande
thir' gudis vndirwrittyn that is to say In the fyrst xiiij alde schep and twa alde nowt
that pertenis to Johne' litstar' his brothir that last deit alsua half a chaldir of atis Item ix
s' g' vj g' of flemys monee Item halff stan of lamb woll Item xvij d' in skynnis Item xvj s'
that fell til his part of a pipe of wad' Item anent Dauy litstar his brothir that fyrst deit
half a chaldir of atis Item ix s' g' vj g' of flemys monee Item half stan of lamb woll'
Item xvij d' for his part of skynnis Item xvj s' scottis of his part of a pipe of wad' Item anent
Duncane litstar his brothir that is liffande with him self half a chaldir of atis Item ix
s' g' vj g' of flemys monee half stan of lamb woll Item xvij d' in skynnis Item
xvj s' for his part of a pipe of wad' Item anent al the saide barnys twa pewter dublaris
Item twa brissin' pottis and a caldroune that pertenis to thaim of thair' fadiris houshalde
Item four' hidis and a half on the samyn wys' Item we ordane as anent the nichtburschip
of the faulde tathing of the gardin that for the scathe that the saide cristy has sustenit
in the saide Johne' of torrylethe and Isabell galt his spous' defaltis that the saide cristy
sall hafe a quartar of atis sowing in the saide faulde at a syde quhar' it pleys' hym
to tak it for all the yeris that he saide faulde is occupijt in sawing and his part
of the lafe of the saide faulde that pertenys til him self eftir the tenour' of his take
And to the keping and fulfilling of our' saide deliuerans and decret bathe the parteis for
saide ar' oblist and sworne' be the fathe of thair' bodijs lelely and trewely but fraude
or gile and the saide Johne' and Isabell sal content and pay to the saide cristy for ilke
rude of the faulde pertenande to thaim ij d'

Item we deliuer that all gudis that the saide Johne' of torryleithe or Isabel galt
his spous' may lauchfully prufe that the saide cristy litstar' has of thairis
pertenande to thaim be the decess' of Johne' litstar' hir' spous' the saide cristy
sall content and pay thaim furth with but delay
Confratres gilde tempore prepositure alexandri de camera

Georgius de fyf receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
causa paterne libertatis et soluit quinque s' in alba bursa qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Ricardus filius Johannis de tulygrig receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis eciam pro quinque s' et prestit prestitit Juramentum solitum

Andreas de Kynnymunde receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
causa paterne libertatis pro quinque s' prestitit Juramentum solitum

Johannes Wricht receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro quinque
s' et prestitit Juramentum solitum

Robertus receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro quinque
s' et prestitit Juramentum solitum

Alexander traile receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne
libertatis pro quinque s' prestitit Juramentum solitum

Andreas receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa
paterne libertatis pro quinque s' qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Thomas D receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa pa
terne libertatis pro quinque s' qui prestitit solitum Juramentum

Robertus receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ex gracia
consilij quia disponsauit filiam Ade qui prestitit solitum
Juramentum et dedit dictum adam plegium pro terra distringibili burgum infra
annum et diem domini nostri Regis

Morisius thomson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro quinque
vino gilde vj s' octo d' qui prestitit Juramentum solitum dedit Willelmum de
Kantle plegium pro terra distringibili infra annum et diem et pro alijs consuetis
debitis

Patricius smitht Ryny apud ecclesiam de Ryny receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
huius burgi pro tribus libris soluendis preposito et x s' confratribus gilde
Burgenses et confratres gilde tempore prepositure alexandri de camera

Thomas Jacobi receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ex gracia consilij
concessa patricio pyot qui prestitit solitum Juramentum et dedit Robertum prat Juniorem plegium pro terra
distringible habenda in dicto burgo infra annum et diem pro amerciamento domini Regis

Willelmus de camera receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ex gracia consilij
qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Dauid galichtly receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ex gracia consilij
qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

X Johannes chapman senior receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde causa paterne libertatis
et prestitit Juramentum solitum et dedit andream chapman patrem suum plegium pro distringibili
terra habenda in dicto burgo infra annum et diem et cetera

Willelmus de setone' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne
libertatis pro quinque s' et prestitit Juramentum solitum

X Robertus Johneson' de ouchtirless' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ex gracia consilij ad requestam Roberti gillespy et prestitit Juramentum solitum et dedit Johannem
glenmalyn plegium pro terra distringibili habenda in dicto burgo infra annum et diem et cetera

Magister alexander de fyf dominus Johannes de camera et georgius de fyf recepti fuerunt
in liberos burgenses et confratres gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis eorundem qui prestiterunt
et eorum quilibet prestitit Juramentum solitum

Johannes Rede filius andree Rede de badfothale receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis qui prestitit solitum Juramentum

Dominus henricus hervy capellanus receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius
burgi causa paterne libertatis qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Willelmus Kemp receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde b huius burgi ex fauore
consilij pro quinque s' qui prestitit solitum Juramentum

sius receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
prestitit Juramentum solitum
Burgenses tantum tempore prepositure dicti alexandri de camera

Thomas Jacobi piscator receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro s' qui prestitit
Juramentum solitum

Robertus marnach' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi causa paterne libertatis
s' qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Alexander feny receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi causa paterne libertatis pro quinque s'
qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Willelmus lorymar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro x s' qui prestitit Juramentum
solitum

Patricius besat scissor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro xx s' qui prestitit
Juramentum solitum

Thomas sadlar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro x s' qui prestitit Juramentum
solitum
Johannes smitht receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro x s' qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Johannes scot scissor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro x s' qui prestitit
Juramentum solitum

Jacobus Kennardy scissor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi pro x s' qui prestitit
Juramentum solitum

Johannes methyson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi causa paterne libertatis
pro quinque s' qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

magister de le place
pip xv barrelis of vnywnys xx barrelis apillis

findelayson the first witnes sworn' and examnyt deponis that the hous' that Johne' philpson'
of fiwy sett to sandris fraser sulde be redy deliueryt till him quhen and quhat tym that the said' sandris
hade ony gudis to put in it and anne vthir' terme sett til him til entre in the saide hous'

Johne Watson' the tothir witnes suorne' and examnyt deponis that herde na terme sett til sandris
fraser til entre in the saide hous' bot that the saide Johne' philpson' hade sett him the hous' full
and fast and the lecon dkin /

Petir' Wischarde the thride witnes suorne' and examnyt deponys and accordis with the fyrst
witnes in all thingis

In the court of aberdene haldin be the bailyeis the xviij day of Januar' the yer' of
god et cetera lxx comperit gilbert the Waus' burges of abirden on that a part ande androw
Alanson' aldirman of the samyn on that vthir part contendande apon' ane half nettis
fisching of the watir of The raike set be the saide gilbert to the forsaide Androw
as in a letter made tharapon' mar' fullely is contenit / for the quhilk contencione and
stanching and sessing of al pleyis bath the sade parties thankfully has consentyt
and submittyt thaim to the personis eftir writtyn to Justifij decide and determyt the
allegacionis of bath the parties beande herde quhilk of the saide parties has richt
to the fisching of the saide watir and thir ar' the personis Johne' of scrogis Johne'
of marr' Androw scherar' Alexander blindsele Dauy colyson' Patrik of badenach
and gilbert of Kintor the quhilk personis sal be sworne' the bodely athe lelely
and trewly to determyt the saide cause eftir thair' consciens and knawlagis as
law and reson' will And gif it be neidfull to thaim and sene' to thaim expedient
to cheis' and call to thaim certan personis of discrecione til mwerr' thaim in the said'
caus' thai sall hafe full power' to tak thaim at thair' pleysance and thai to be
sworne' in sic like wys' as thir' forsaide personis ar' and as thai deliuer the matir
and quhom to thai decret the richt of the saide watir and fisching sal be kepit be
bath the parties forsaide but excepcione fraude or gile to the quhilkis thai
ar' bundin be the fathis of thair' bodijs and quhat personis that thai tak
to thaim sal be tane be the avis' of bath the parteis And this caus' to be
endyt betuix this and candilmess' gif the aldirman be present and at hame
and gif he be nocht present til ende it apon' four' dayis warnyng eftir'
that he come hame / and than the forsaide caus' to be endit as law will eftir
the avamentis of the parties forsaide /

The xvj day of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxx yer' philp of Drumbrek ane
of the seriandis of this burgh' has present in the merkat to a gray hors' of Johne
fechatis mathowson' quhilk is tane in a ras' in part of payment of a hamburgh barell
of salmunde acht til Will of mernys baxtar' and thar' is him xij s' as
for the fyrst day befor' thir' witnes Johne' of Knollis bailye cristy litstar' and Duncane
of birss'

The xxti day of the forsaide moneth' Johne' of tulydeff ane of the seriandis of the said'
burgh present the fornemnit hors' in the merkat to sell' and thar' was biddin fo him xx s'
befor thir' witnes richarde of hill thome maliceson' and alexander of scrogis

The xxiiij day of the saide moneth' of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera the saide philp of
Drumbrek seriande present the forsaide hors' in the merkat to sell' and thar' was biddin for
him that day xiij s' iiij d' witnes Duncane of birss' and androw atkin befor'
Johne' of Knollis the bailye

The xxviiij day of the saide moneth the forsaide philp of Drumbrek seriande present
the saide hors' in the markate to sell and thar' was biddine for hym that day as
The ferde day and prisit with edmunde bannerman Duncane of birss' Androw atkin
and be thair' athis sworne' xxvj s' befor' thir' witnes Androw scherar' and Johne'
of Knollis balyeis William maliceson' androw haldane and Duncane of lammynton
and of this some' giffin the officiar' xij d' for his labour' and for the hors' costis
iij oukis iij s' and sua restis vnpayit of the xl s' for the barell' of salmunde
aucht to Willam of mathowson viij s'

vxor' Johannis fechat
vxor Johannis nachty
Cristiana laynge
propinatrix Johannis de culan
Mariora pery
mariota boll
vxor Johannis scherar'
vxor magni Donaldi
vxor thome gardenar'
vxor andree baxtar
vxor Johannis de hill

Introitus nauis de le busch de breill quam sub deo gubernat Jan andirson'
In primis xvj last beir'
Item xxviij bollis of ber'
Item xxiiij barellis of apillis
Item xij vj barellis of walnutis
Item iij fraaris figis
Item vij frayaris raysingis
Item a stic of rinche wyne'
